title: Collaborative Learning Program for Distributed Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: For mathematics professionals, including hands-on activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the necessity of distributed leadership in various roles within an organization in three or more ways
Learners perform two or more experiences of shared leadership with team members through collaborative problem-solving activities
Learners can participate in and analyze results from a leadership role distribution simulation using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
